attributes.action: To raise the awareness for people who suffer from alzheimers or another form of dementia
attributes.additional_details: People who suffer from alzheimers or another form of dementia deserve more awareness and should increase funding for  those care homes or hospitals who look after victims of alzheimers or dementia.

rejection.details: Please see: A radical overhaul of the Care System for the elderly suffering dementia illness in Hospitals, at Home and in Care Homes
